snippet: Utah officials initially sent mixed messages about whether they would recognize the marriages but ultimately said they were “on hold,” while federal officials said they would recognize them.
lead_paragraph: Utah officials initially sent mixed messages about whether they would recognize the marriages but ultimately said they were “on hold,” while federal officials said they would recognize them.

headline.main: Justices Say Utah Doesn't Have to Recognize Gay Marriages

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
